column5: What colors do you fishermen prefer in the early spring bite for walleye and northern? I'm leaving for Red Lake a week from today and flying west from there roughly 45 miles. I'm fishing Donald Lake in the Woodland Caribou park. We tend to fish with jigs, spinners and shad raps. We love trolling too. LoDo
if you like to troll try hotntots or canadian wiglers crome on sunny days chartruese on cloudy days.if water is real clear try darker colors
